name: Cursed West
description: Cursed West contains the spirit of Glories of the past, Holding aspects such as Difficulty and Mechanics. Adding more modern visuals in both, levels with traditional 2d gameplay, as in the 3d...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual core 1.8ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 210 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: 1280x720 Resolution/ The game supports gamepads/joysticks once inside the game (after launch)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7 Processor: Dual core 3.0ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Ati Radeon HD 6670 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: 1280x720 Resolution/ The game supports gamepads/joysticks once inside the game (after launch)

reviews.review_text: ok, i will wait the update.  Speed of the game should be increased...pls.  Thanks
